content: Dr. Sarani BhattacharyaSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationSarani BhattacharyaAssistant ProfessorDepartment of Computer Science and EngineeringIndian Institute of Technology KharagpurRoom: 306, CSE Main Building, IIT Kharagpur, Kharagpur 721302, IndiaI am Sarani Bhattacharya, a newly appointed Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Kharagpur. I have a Ph.D from CSE, IIT Kharagpur and I come from a background of micro-architectural security. I am generally interested in teaching and research of Computer Architecture, Computer Security, Micro-architectural advancements, and their inherent security implications. Before joining here, I was working for 2 years with a brilliant group of Computer Architects and Researchers in imec, Belgium. I also have a post-doctoral experience for 2 years in COSIC, KU Leuven. Apart from this I was also involved in short-term research internships in NTU Singapore and University of Adelaide, Australia. I am looking for interested and motivated students to work together. Please drop an email if you are interested. Looking forward to exciting research experiences  ahead.Google SitesReport abusePage detailsPage updated Google SitesReport abuse
